regen.absent_element: indication of non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: The month report shall include the periods when the DH System was non-operational to indicate any downtime occurrences.

regen.new_specification: The month report shall indicate any non-operational periods of the DH system within the given month and year.

regen.absent_element: indication of non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: DigitalHome shall provide a report indicating any non-operational periods of the DH System for the specified month and year.

label: The month report shall provide a section that indicates the periods of time when the DH System was not in operation.
